properties.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
properties.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 2 at 3:50AM PST until March 2 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation.
A few of the most wind protected valleys may drop slightly below
freezing as well.

* WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern
Mendocino Interior Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left
uncovered.
properties.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

NWSheadline: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IS CANCELLED
